markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Munitions Machinist](/Feats.aspx?ID=3172) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 113</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Munitions Crafter](/Feats.aspx?ID=3158); Expert in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

You're particularly adept at crafting ammunition and bombs. Your advanced alchemy level for ammunition and bombs increases to your level – 3.

<title level="2">Munitions Machinist leads to...</title>
[Precious Munitions](/Feats.aspx?ID=3185)
name: Munitions Machinist
